PHRASE.LANG:
Always know what the time is with this working clock.
 
 The time is automatically set using the time on your PlayStation®3.
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Timepieces - Traditional Alarm Clock
 (2) Timepieces - Modern Brass Plate Wall-Clock
 (3) Timepieces - Traditional Grandfather Clock
 (4) Timepieces - Contemporary Grandfather Clock
 (5) Timepieces - Art Deco Table Clock [#Legal]

Sachez quelle heure il est à tout moment, grâce à cette horloge fonctionnelle.
 
 L'heure est automatiquement réglée par rapport à celle de votre PlayStation®3.
 
 Ce lot contient :
 (1) Timepieces - Horloge réveil traditionnelle
 (2) Timepieces - Horloge murale moderne en cuivre
 (3) Timepieces - Pendule traditionnelle
 (4) Timepieces - Pendule contemporaine
 (5) Timepieces - Pendule de table Art déco [#Legal]

Mit dieser voll funktionsfähigen Uhr wissen Sie immer, wie spät es ist!
 
 Die Zeit wird automatisch an die Zeit auf Ihrer PlayStation®3 angepasst.
 
 Dieses Bündel enthält:
 (1) Timepieces - Altmodischer Wecker
 (2) Timepieces - Moderne Wanduhr aus Messing
 (3) Timepieces - Altmodische Standuhr
 (4) Timepieces - Zeitgenössische Standuhr
 (5) Timepieces - Tischuhr im Art-déco-Stil [#Legal]

Potrai sapere sempre che ora è con questo orologio perfettamente funzionante.
 
 L'orario è impostato automaticamente in funzione dell'ora segnata sulla tua PlayStation®3. Questo set comprende:
 (1) Timepieces - Orologio Sveglia Tradizionale
 (2) Timepieces - Orologio da parete moderno con piastra in ottone
 (3) Timepieces - Pendola a colonna Tradizionale
 (4) Timepieces - Pendola a colonna Contemporanea
 (5) Timepieces - Orologio da tavolo Art Deco
 [#Legal]

Estate siempre al tanto de la hora con este fiable reloj.
 
 La hora se configura automáticamente mediante la que tienes en tu PlayStation®3.
 
 Este pack contiene:
 (1) Timepieces - Reloj despertador tradicional
 (2) Timepieces - Moderno reloj de pared de metal
 (3) Timepieces - Reloj de abuelo tradicional
 (4) Timepieces - Reloj de abuelo contemporáneo
 (5) Timepieces - Reloj de mesa Art Deco [#Legal]

Always know what the time is with this working clock.
 
 The time is automatically set using the time on your PlayStation®3.
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) Timepieces - Traditional Alarm Clock
 (2) Timepieces - Modern Brass Plate Wall-Clock
 (3) Timepieces - Traditional Grandfather Clock
 (4) Timepieces - Contemporary Grandfather Clock
 (5) Timepieces - Art Deco Table Clock
 
 ※Upon purchase, the items will be placed into their respective categories.
 ※Active items provide more functionality than normal items. You may only place limited numbers of the active items in your apartment or clubhouse at any time. [#Legal]
